title: Vaanam Lyrics Power Paandi
stanzas: <div>Vaanam Song Lyrics Power Paandi

Vaanam parandhu
paarka yaengum
pookkal siragai neettudhaa

oadum nadhiyinile oadam
oindhu karaiyai thaeduthaa

endrum ivanum kuzhandhaiyaa.
vaarthai innum mazhalaiyaa.
sirippil idhayam ponguthe
karunai sindhuthe.

kaatru mazhaiyil modhalaam
andha kadalil saeralaam
indha kuzhandhai koottathil
ivanum thendralae.

mannaadhi mannaa
veeraadhi veeraa
engal nanbaa.. paandi.

vilaiyaadum singam
vilaiyillaa thangam
engal nanbaa
power paandi.

pudhiya Vaanam parandhu
paarka yaengum
pookkal siragai neettudhaa

Vazhaikaiye endrume
edhayo thaedum payanam
irudhiyil adaikkalam
paeran paethi jananam

yaeno oadinom
eththanai kanavu.
oaindhu poi saaivadhu
kuzhandhai irukkum koodu.

idhuthana sugamaa
kadavulin varamaa
kangalil kanneer thaalaattumaa

thaayum illai
thaaramum illai.
maganin magalae
nee oadi vaa.

tholil ondru
madiyil ondru unarndhaal
mattum puriyum
uyir mattum
idhu podhum.

Vaanam parandhu
paarka yaengum
pookkal siragai neettudhaa

oadum nadhiyinile oadam
oindhu karaiyai thaeduthaa

endrum ivanum kuzhandhaiyaa.
vaarthai innum mazhalaiyaa.
sirippil idhayam ponguthe
karunai sindhuthe.

kaatru mazhaiyil modhalaam
andha kadalil saeralaam
indha kuzhandhai koottathil
ivanum thendralae.

mannaadhi mannaa
veeraadhi veeraa
engal nanbaa.. paandi.

vilaiyaadum singam
vilaiyillaa thangam
engal nanbaa
power paandi.

pudhiya Vaanam parandhu
paarka yaengum
pookkal siragai neettudhaa

*********************
Oru soora kaaththu
oora paaththu poguthu.
manasellaam pooththu
vaanam paaththu yaerudhu

Oru soora kaaththu
oora paaththu poguthu.
manasellaam pooththu
vaanam paaththu yaerudhu

pala kuyilu koovudhu
oru mayilu aaduthu
oru vaanavillu
thaedi vandhu
powder poosuthu..

oru kadhavu thorakkuthu
pudhu vazhigal porakkudhu
vayasaana singam
jeans pottu dance aaduthu

ada naadi thudikkudhu
pudhu vegam porakkudhu
ada palaiya raththam
paththi eriyudhu
kodhikkuthu.

Oru soora kaaththu
oora paaththu poguthu.
manasellaam pooththu
vaanam paaththu yaerudhu

Oor ulagam
kaaladiyilthaan adanguthu.
paer sollida
poar muzhakkam thaan
muzhanguthu.

kaagangalum
megangalum
keela parakkudhu
vinveliyil ennudaiya
face theriyudhu.

ini baarangal ellaam
en baaram thaangum.
nana podum
thaazhathuk ellaam aadum.

idhuthaanda sorgam
adhu ippo en pakkam.
naan pona pinnal
en paer nikkum

andha STARum naanda
andha SUNum naandaa
andha SUNoda vinnum naandaa
odhungudaa

Oru soora kaaththu
kaaththu kaaththu
enna paaththu
soora kaaththu

Oru soora kaaththu
oora paaththu poguthu.
manasellaam pooththu
vaanam paaththu yaerudhu

pala kuyilu koovudhu
oru mayilu aaduthu
oru vaanavillu
thaedi vandhu
powder poosuthu..

oru kadhavu thorakkuthu
pudhu vazhigal porakkudhu
vayasaana singam
jeans pottu dance aaduthu

ada naadi thudikkudhu
vegam porakkudhu
ada palaiya raththam
paththi eriyudhu
kodhikkuthu.

seo.title: Vaanam Lyrics Power Paandi
seo.description: Get the complete Vaanam Lyrics Power Paandi from Power Paandi. Read the lyrics penned by Selvaraghavan and composed by Sean Roldan and sung by Ananthu. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Selvaraghavan, Power Paandi, Sean Roldan, Ananthu, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
